doc.title: 15 to Life
doc.plot: A chronicle of Anthony Papa's 12-year stay at a New York maximum-security prison, where he developed his artistic skills, which led to his being shown at the Whitney Museum, and an eventual granting of clemency from then-Governor George Pataki.
